The class MajorityVoteCombinator implements a combinator of results that selects a the result that appears the most often in among the ones passed each time it is called.

MonitoredServer - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.examples.components
The class MonitoredServer implements a request server that monitors its request queue size and notify a dispatcher that selects servers to dispatch them request depending on their queue sizes.

MonitoredServer.MonitoredServerExecutorServiceFactory - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.examples.components
The class MonitoredServerExecutorServiceFactory implements the executor service factory that will be used to create the pool of threads used to executed the requests on this server.
MonitoredServer.ServerState - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.examples.components
The class ServerState implements the way the state information about this server will be sent to the dispatcher.
MonitoredServer.SizeChange - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.examples.components
The class SizeChange records a size change in the request queue with the time at which this change happen.
